description:
DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!

You do not have to pay a lot for training to prepare and pass the PMI Risk Management Professional Exam. By taking this course, you will have life-time access to EVERYTHING you need to know to be a SUCCESSFUL Risk Management Professional and pass the PMI-RMP exam.

What our students are saying
“Perfect course with Techniques & Tools you can use to pass the exam, one of the best resources”. Mr. Heba Yusuf

This course will provide you with EVERYTHING you need to know to successfully prepare and pass the PMI Risk Management Professional (RMP)® exam.

The same content as this course provides you will have to pay many hundreds of USD for other places.

You can use the Course to claim 5.5 hours of RISK education credit to help you meet the PMI exam requirements

The course is divided into the following main topics:

  • Detailed training in the PMI RMP® curriculum
  • Downloadable worksheets to help you manage Project Risk as a Risk Manager or Project Manager
  • The RMP® exam requirements explained
  • The RMP® exam explained in details
  • Tools and Techniques to help you successfully pass the RMP® exam
  • The RMP® Questions explained in details

The content of the topics are created based on the PMI Risk Management Professional processes and curriculum, as well as experience from recently successfully passing the exam to provide you the latest valuable insight knowledge, tools and techniques to help you to pass the exam.
title: Preparation for PMI Risk Management Professional (RMP)® exam
